SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameController extends Object implements Serializable
This class implements the controller for each game. It contains all the methods that are available to call from the client. It manages the recreation of the game after to handle its persistence.
See Also:
